description: Dark-haired, tattooed Trevor Miller and fit hunk JJ Knight have been dating for a while, but beefy Trevor can’t handle it anymore, and wants to end the relationship. He works up the courage to finally tell JJ it’s over, however, JJ knows that his fat, thick dick is too good to break up with. He pulls it out knowing Trevor will change his mind, and give him a nice, wet blowjob before submitting his ass for a peace keeping drilling.
title: But That Dick Is So Good
